Test Name: NTRK Genes Mutation Analysis by Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS)
Purpose: To detect and characterize mutations in NTRK1, NTRK2, and NTRK3 genes in tumor samples for clinical interpretation.
Equipment: Validated DNA extraction kit, spectrophotometer/fluorometer, bioanalyzer, next-generation sequencer (e.g., Illumina or Thermo Fisher platform)
